title: They Donâ€™t Shine
lyrics:
Don't ask me what I think about it, I don't even know
Cause my heart's ticking down and the spring's about to go
Got a lot of cloudy feelings on account of what they done
You got my eyes burning like honey in the sun
Shine

They don't shine just for anyone

Shine

They don't shine just for anyone



I was scratching at the windows of the folks up on the hill

But I ain't calling down the bright lights anymore, I had my fill

Now the comedy is over, the tragedy is done

You got my eyes burning like honey in the sun



Shine

They don't shine just for anyone

Shine

They don't shine just for anyone



Shine

They don't shine just for anyone

Shine

They don't shine just for anyone

Shine

They don't shine just for anyone



Shine, shine, shine for anyone

Oh shine

Shine, shine, shine just for anyone

They don't shine for anyone

Shine, shine, shine for anyone

They don't shine

Shine, shine, shine just for anyone

Oh they don't shine

Shine, shine, shine for anyone

Oh you can make them shine

Shine, shine, shine just for anyone

Come on, make them shine

Shine, shine, shine for anyone...
